data: There was once a time (he began) when I decided that I was a fraud; that I could not be a psychical researcher any longer.

The Psychical Researcher's Tale - The Sceptical Poltergeist
From "The New Decameron", Volume III.
browsing: literature|browsing: religion/spirituality/paranormal|browsing: fiction|category: science-fiction & fantasy|category: novels
